server.session

Class AuthenticationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.rest.controllers.Controller
      • server.session.AuthenticationController

  • @CrossOrigin(origins={"http://localhost:1234","http://theterminal.s3-website.us-west-2.amazonaws.com"},
             methods={GET,POST})
 @RestController
public class AuthenticationController
extends Controller
    Controller for the Authentication related tables Provides all the REST endpoints related to Authentication and stored SQL procedures
